fields.description: The new back button mechanism uses url hashes to manage itself. Unfortunately these hashes make it impossible to set a breakpoint cross window openings. To fix this, the back mechanism needs to be embedded in an iFrame.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: New back button mechanisms prevents breakpoints from being set

comments.body: Back button support simply isn't there to properly solve this problem. Instead, we are implementing iOS style navigation in TIMOB-7981.
